design_identity.core_philosophy: Fusion of 'TikTok' immediacy with 'Newspaper' credibility. Immersive, gesture-driven, and hyper-local.

usage_rules: Headings (News Titles) must be Serif (Merriweather) to retain journalistic authority within the modern UI.
Body text and UI controls use DM Sans for high legibility on mobile.
Overlay text must have 'drop-shadow-md' or be placed on a 'from-black/90' gradient.

guidelines: Use Immersive Dark theme. The background is the content (Image).
UI controls (buttons, pills) should be semi-transparent white/glass: 'bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-md'.
Avoid solid opaque backgrounds for overlay elements.

layout_structure.grid_system: Mobile-first, single column, 100dvh (dynamic viewport height) containers.

NewsCard.description: Full-screen card component handling gestures and content display.

CategoryFilter.description: Horizontal scrollable list of pills at the top.
specs: Position: Fixed top-16 left-0 right-0 z-40
Interaction: Tap to filter, swipe horizontal to scroll list

ActionSidebar.description: Vertical stack of interaction buttons (Like, Share, Bookmark) on the right edge.

swipe_logic.implementation_note: Use 'drag' prop with constraints. On 'dragEnd', detect offset > 100px. Trigger state change.

animations.text_reveal: Staggered entrance for Title -> Summary -> Meta

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'framer-motion' if not present (already in package.json).
Create a 'NewsFeed' container that manages the array of news items.
Implement the 'NewsCard' as a direct child of AnimatePresence.
Use 'drag' constraints to create the swipe feel. Do not use simple CSS scroll snap; use physics-based gesture handling.
The 'Right = Next' logic is unconventional but mandatory. Map the 'Swipe Right' gesture to the 'Next Item' function.
Add a visual indicator (arrows or subtle glint) to hint at multi-directional swipe capability on first load.
For the 'Share' functionality, use the Web Share API (navigator.share) if available, fallback to clipboard copy.
Use the provided image URLs for the mock data.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations.
